description: Sony MDR-E828LP/SLV Earbud Headphones w/Winding Case Super-light in-the-ear design; High quality 16mm driver units for enhanced sound; Neodymium magnetsfor superior sound. Features: * Sony Acoustic Twin Turbo Circuit for enhanced bass response * Sleek black and silver metallic housing * Compact winding case supplied * Silent cap to prevent sound leakage Available in March, 2008
title: Sony MDRE828LP/SLV Lightweight Earbuds (Silver)
